channel.title: How to make a good staker
channel.description:
My friend did this. Make an account call it what ever the hell you want. Train on rock crabs. Raise the attack to 70 and def to 60 and str about 30. Dont ask why. When you are staking wear full bronze. Then stake something and when you duel switch your armour to full rune with a glory ammy and a dragon scimitar or whip.
My friend so far has made about 200k and alot of junk lvl about..56 i think =\
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ hope this helps!

item.title: How to make a good staker
item.dc:creator: @man_u_4eva9 man u 4eva9
item.description:
@man_u_4eva9 wrote:

my staker is level 78 with 99 strengh, 77 range, 1 defence, 60 atack, 87 magic(on ancients) and i can make like 3m per day on good days

me out~

lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a good staker

item.title: How to make a good staker
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

That staker sucks, get 70+ range, 85+ mage, 70+ att 80+ str, try to do desert treasure, if you can’t you got a good staker.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a good staker

item.title: How to make a good staker
item.dc:creator: @l3etal3lade l3etal3lade
item.description:
@l3etal3lade wrote:

My staker is lvl 48 combat 62 attack 5 defense and 42 strength and I’ve done fairly well with him sofar more profit then loss whihc is always nice and I do pretty well against rangers and very well against mages only other melle pures give me a truly hard time.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a good staker

item.title: How to make a good staker
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

o0o!? 200k? I make that in merchanting each day.

This may be good, I have no clue as I’ve never made my own staker. But if you want to make a melee pure, get your defense to like 5, attack to 40, and strength to infinity and beyond.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a good staker
